sense.def:
Kadar človek
needs something
ali
needs to do something
, mora nekaj imeti ali narediti.

seg.quote: These animals need food throughout the winter.
Children need to feel they matter to someone.
Before we answer this question, we need to look briefly at the world environment.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
need not happen
ali kadar nekdo
need not do something
pomeni, da ni pravega vzroka, da bi se nekaj res zgodilo ali da bi nekdo moral nekaj narediti.

seg.quote: People died of diseases that need not have proved fatal.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
needs a particular action
ali kadar neko dejanje
needs doing
, je tisto treba storiti.

seg.quote: The shed needs a good clean out.
Keep a list of all the jobs that need doing.
The top rim needs to be cut off.

sense.def:
One's needs
so stvari, ki jih potrebujemo za zadovoljujoče življenje.

seg.quote: She learned how to provide for her own needs.

sense.def:
A need
je tudi močan občutek, da moramo nekaj imeti ali storiti.

seg.quote: I began to feel the need of somewhere to retreat.
She felt no need to speak.

sense.def:
Izraz
if need be
uporabimo, kadar hočemo reči, da bo nekaj narejeno, če bo potrebno.

seg.quote: She said she would stay with me for months and years if need be.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo ali nekaj
in need of something
, tisto zelo potrebuje.

seg.quote: I am badly in need of advice.
The hospital was in need of decorating.

sense.def:
Ljudje
in need
nimajo dovolj denarja ali potrebujejo tako ali drugačno pomoč.
